messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Refuse to Choose?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Do you mean Barbara Sher?  I m not familiar with that title, but here s a link to her website.  Maybe you can figure this out:
messages.messageBody:
At 08:01 6/2/2006, you wrote:
>I have been searching for the book, "Refuse to Choose! A Revolutionary
>Program for Doing Everything that You Love" by Barbara, this morning.
>I came up with nothing through the library co-op. Ditto for
>Amazon.com. Can anyone tell me Barbara's last name? Do I have the
>title right?

Do you mean Barbara Sher? I'm not familiar with that title, but
here's a link to her website. Maybe you can figure this out:

http://www.barbarasher.com/index.htm

She's really cool!!




_.:~`^'~:._.:~`^'~:._.:~`^'~:._.:~`^'~:._.:~`^'~:._.:~`^'~:._.:~`^'~:._.:~`^'~:._

messages.subject: Refuse to Choose?
messages.msgSnippet: I have been searching for the book, Refuse to Choose! A Revolutionary Program for Doing Everything that You Love by Barbara, this morning. I came up with
messages.messageBody:
I have been searching for the book, "Refuse to Choose! A Revolutionary
Program for Doing Everything that You Love" by Barbara, this morning.
I came up with nothing through the library co-op. Ditto for
Amazon.com. Can anyone tell me Barbara's last name? Do I have the
title right?

Thanks - Tina
